general.name: spAllLine
general.short: Contains a summary of the Spectro-1D spZline output for all spectra.
general.description: Contains a summary of the Spectro-1D spZline output for all spectra with line measurements

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: eBOSS
surveys.description: A cosmological survey of quasars and galaxies to understand baryon acoustic oscillations

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu1.name: SPLINE
hdu1.description: contains a summary of the Spectro-1D spZline output for all spectra.

FIELD.name: FIELD
FIELD.description: SDSS FieldID (plateID for plate era data)

TARGET_INDEX.name: TARGET_INDEX
TARGET_INDEX.description: Target Index (1 to number of targets)

LINEWAVE.name: LINEWAVE
LINEWAVE.description: Catalog wavelength of line in vacuum Angstroms

LINESIGMA_ERR.name: LINESIGMA_ERR
LINESIGMA_ERR.description: Gaussian width error (<0 for invalid fit)

LINEEW_ERR.name: LINEEW_ERR
LINEEW_ERR.description: Equivalent width error (<0 for invalid fit)

LINECONTLEVEL_ERR.name: LINECONTLEVEL_ERR
LINECONTLEVEL_ERR.description: Error in continuum level at line center

LINECHI2.name: LINECHI2
LINECHI2.description: chi2 for all points in 3 sigma of line center
